channel.title: CVE Feed for Omron -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Omron -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-27259|2024-09-16T16:33:13.557Z -- omron -- cx-one
item.description: The Omron CX-One Version 4.60 and prior may allow an attacker to supply a pointer to arbitrary memory locations, which may allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2022-25959|2024-09-16T16:39:07.829Z -- omron -- cx-position
item.description: Omron CX-Position (versions 2.5.3 and prior) is vulnerable to memory corruption while processing a specific project file, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2018-19027|2024-09-16T17:09:00.258Z -- omron -- cx-protocol%20within%20cx-one
item.description: Three type confusion vulnerabilities exist in CX-One Versions 4.50 and prior and CX-Protocol Versions 2.0 and prior when processing project files. An attacker could use a specially crafted project file to exploit and execute code under the privileges of the application.

item.title: CVE-2022-26419|2024-09-16T18:08:28.165Z -- omron -- cx-position
item.description: Omron CX-Position (versions 2.5.3 and prior) is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflow conditions while parsing a specific project file, which may allow an attacker to locally execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2018-17913|2024-09-16T17:47:42.838Z -- omron -- cx-supervisor
item.description: A type confusion vulnerability exists when processing project files in Omron CX-Supervisor Versions 3.4.1.0 and prior, which may allow an attacker to execute code in the context of the application.

item.title: CVE-2018-17909|2024-09-16T20:58:29.132Z -- omron -- cx-supervisor
item.description: When processing project files in Omron CX-Supervisor Versions 3.4.1.0 and prior, the application fails to check if it is referencing freed memory, which may allow an attacker to execute code under the context of the application.

item.title: CVE-2022-3398|2024-09-16T18:28:22.335Z -- omron -- cx-programmer
item.description: OMRON CX-Programmer 9.78 and prior is vulnerable to an Out-of-Bounds Write, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2022-21137|2024-09-16T20:27:32.677Z -- omron -- cx-one
item.description: Omron CX-One Versions 4.60 and prior are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow while processing specific project files, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2022-3396|2024-09-16T20:31:44.706Z -- omron -- cx-programmer
item.description: OMRON CX-Programmer 9.78 and prior is vulnerable to an Out-of-Bounds Write, which may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code.
